archimate:BusinessService.name: Dynamic financing
archimate:BusinessService.documentation: Use Case for #4: Tradeshift dynamic financing https://tradeshift.com/supply-chain-finance or Buffer - https://www.spv.no/bedrift/laane-og-finansiere/buffer Potential Know Your Customer (KYC) use case: Ascertain whether your customer will have liquidity on a given due date - and extend credit or shorten the due-date period accordingly.
